data.text: And the tweets are coming thick and fast today! #team7 on Christmas Jumper Day yesterday in Verulab science club showing off their scientific Christmas tree ⁦@VerulamScience⁩ ⁦@verulamschool⁩ #verulamforlife https://t.co/OcXFIFLJK2
Yet more Letters of Recognition for #team7. So proud of how many of you are showing the core values of excellence, character and respect #verulamforlife @verulamschool https://t.co/vWvlJ3Js1m

Amazing talent from our Year 7 boys who participated in the production of A Christmas Carol! Claude, Jack, George, Jack, Kendrick, Jamie, Sunny and Charlie did @verulamschool proud! Well done to them and the rest of the fantastic cast #verulamforlife https://t.co/EyAokf8QEq
Christmas jumper day has come to Year 7 to spread some festive cheer! #Christmasjumperday2022 #team7 #verulamforlife @verulamschool https://t.co/4VY5rFtVeH
Some of our Year 7 boys are taking part! Get your tickets and support them #team7 https://t.co/VXaRAKPFQd
Letter of Recognition winners in 7J and 7Y #verulamforlife #team7 https://t.co/CwEUWJgm10
Come on #team7 earn those house points!!! https://t.co/TAhAPGjIWa

Our latest Letter of Recognition winners towards their Blue Stag award. Pascoe, Luca, Tommy, Evan, Csongor and Paolo. Evan is also the boy with the most “LORs” in the school! Congratulations to you all! #team7 #verulamforlife @verulamschool https://t.co/W437sd8n0E
Odd socks for #OddSocksDay #AntiBullyingWeek ! Let’s celebrate diversity together #inclusiveforlife #verulamforlife @verulamschool https://t.co/UhbPY5Mnbv

@neebs77 I personally ensured it was on Facebook and I checked that it was posted too. I’m sorry you missed it.
@neebs77 It was posted on Facebook earlier too
@NotebookPages Just on Holywell Hill now
Year 7 Museum of London Trip ETA 4-4:30pm. Traffic is heavy due to poor weather!

Here are our lates Letter of Recognition winners in assembly today. Noah 7B, Rishank 7C, Evan 7Y, Theo 7Y and Ollie 7C for displaying the @verulamschool core values of Excellence, Character and Respect. #verulamforlife #team7 https://t.co/ga1jk6nLpb
#team7 wrote some wonderful letters. I am sure their old primary schools will love to hear about their amazing experiences so far! #verulamforlife https://t.co/ORvd2sRnuq
https://t.co/pQkcPKAGSc Verulam Vox features articles from our Year 7 boys and the form photos! Well worth a read! #verulamforlife

Claude 7H and Tyler 7P give Prayers for the World and Prayers for our School at the Annual Service of Thanksgiving and Dedication at St Albans Abbey #verulamforlife #compassionateforlife #team7 #abbeyservice https://t.co/jbtHwmYIdk
Such an interactive and creative way to learn A Midsomer Night’s Dream with 7C #creativethinkersforlife #verulamforligelife #team7 https://t.co/vEb0ie0tfD
I have just watched 7C acting out a scene of A Midsomer Night’s Dream in English with Ms Davey! Such a lovely thing to see! #creativethinkersforlife #verulamforlife #team7 https://t.co/lkhS76jO6n

Great way to end the term with our Accelerated Reader millionnaires, Theo, Evan and Csongor, having read over a million words and Ollie who won the prize for the War Horse event. #creativethinkersforlife #verulamforlife #team7 #celebrations https://t.co/zMLkb8aNMl
Here are a selection of photos from previous years on the Year 7 Lake District trip. Our trip is set to be just as exciting! #team7 #LakeDistrict #VerulamForLife https://t.co/D0HlfgDU9G

Parents & carers please check your Parent Mail for the letter for the Lake District trip. This is the trip that boys talk about even in sixth form so it will be amazing to have the whole year group there! It’s an experience that the boys don’t want to miss! #team7 #LakeDistrict

Excited to announce that the Lake District residential trip is back over May Half Term 2023. Got some amazing things planned like mountain walking, water sports, ghyll scrambling and abseiling up at Ambleside. Parent mail will be sent out in the coming days! #team7 https://t.co/vIClcQxtpB
Lovely to see so many of our new Year 7 parents and carers join us this afternoon! #team7 https://t.co/sYlHdCFLYR
RT @jrichardson_j: Welcome lunch preparations are in full swing for our new Year 7 and their parents ⁦@verulamschool⁩ today 12-2pm #Verulam…

This is 7H, the only form in the whole school with 100% attendance and the most house points in Year 7! Rewards given out in assembly this morning! Can the others catch you? #settingthetrend #verulamforlife https://t.co/0biSebE9Sl

FEED project starts on Tuesday! I have targeted Year 7 to bring in 1500 items. That’s less than 10 items per student or the equivalent of £3 each to help those in St Albans in need of the food bank! Let’s do this #team7 #compassionateforlife
Year 7 notice board is coming along now with form photos, photos of key staff, map of the school, code of conduct and equality posters! #team7 #verulamforlife https://t.co/KNcGuhPEe2
Go #Team7! Doing @verulamschool proud already and it’s only 2 weeks in #verulamforlife https://t.co/HZa2uXU5K7

Parents of Year 7 remember to get your tickets for the Welcome lunch this Saturday. Please reply by Wednesday so food can be ordered. Spread the word to those who don’t yet follow us on Twitter. Looking forward to seeing you there. Mr Knowles #verulamforlife @verulamschool

@MrKnowlesPhys first assembly to Year 7 talking about change and new beginnings. It was poignant to start with the death of Queen Elizabeth II and the changes that this will bring about. #verulamforlife https://t.co/woMryq0mCG
7 York https://t.co/t9r3wxM5HH

Year 7 are finally here and so far it has gone amazingly well! They looked so smart in their uniforms!
RT @jrichardson_j: A big focus for us ⁦@verulamschool⁩ this year #InclusiveForLife #CompassionateForLife #CreativeThinkersForLife #VerulamF…
RT @jrichardson_j: Open Evening is the 26th September 5 to 8:30pm #VerulamForLife https://t.co/OVrwsPMxsR
@SarahSlvc Year 7 will now start on Monday 5th with the rest of the school this year. My letter that I sent before the summer is correct.
The lakes is back!
Saturday 16th July 2022 transition morning playing games with form tutors. #team7 #verulamforlife @verulamschool https://t.co/adGsgSozQO
Saturday 16th July 2022 transition morning. Off to win the treasure hunt. #team7 #verulamforlife @verulamschool https://t.co/Bb7ouF4k7Z
Saturday 16th July 2022 transition morning playing games with form tutors. #team7 #verulamforlife @verulamschool https://t.co/wUvuQIm3kG

Lovely morning with Year 6 today. Lots of quality time, team building and fun activities with their form tutors. Treasure hunt around the school and cookies and juice in the sunshine! Photos will follow on Monday! #team7 #verulamforlife #newbeginnings @verulamschool

Thank you to the wonderful sixth form team that helped out with the Year 7 secondary transfer day too! They showed great leadership with the new students and even got involved in the lessons #verulamforlife #team7 @Verulam6thForm @verulamschool https://t.co/4nNrY56rfL

More great taster lessons for our new Year 7s on secondary transfer day. English with Mrs Shute, science with Miss Tan and Spanish with Mrs Ruggieri #team7 #verulamforlife #creativethinkersforlife @verulamschool https://t.co/fUcGDdjQyd

More taster lessons for Secondary transfer day. Maths with Mrs Cornmell, Art with Ms Watford and D&T with Mr Phillips and Mr Sem-Brako #team7 #verulamforlife #creativethinkersforlife @verulamschool https://t.co/A0kXRIXEeG

Some amazing and inspiring taster lessons from Secondary transfer day. Computing and maths lessons with Ms Nazir and Ms Moreland #team7 #verulamforlife #creativethinkersforlife @verulamschool https://t.co/wlDVW0b0xf
Secondary transfer day 14th July 2022 and Mr Knowles delivering his first assembly to the new Year 7 boys with Miss Perry and Mr Flack #team7 #verulamforlife @verulamschool https://t.co/5ZK14PmZvy
What an amazing day with my new year group! My boys are going to be the best year we have had! Love them all! #team7 @verulamschool

Tomorrow we unveil the form groups to our new #team7 boys as they join us for secondary transfer day. Our wonderful form tutors are so excited to meet the boys tomorrow and on Saturday too! #verulamforlife #newbeginnings @verulamschool https://t.co/d2dYSdz2oU
RT @MrKnowlesPhys: Today we delivered our first Verulam Pride assembly to Year 10 unveiling our Pride Ambassadors and lanyards, Happy As I…

In 7 years time we will be doing the same for my new Year 6 boys! Congratulations to the wonderful Y13 and the resilience you have shown particularly over the last 2 years! Can’t wait to see your results in August! #verulamforlife https://t.co/Rp9fwee7tW

RT @tommyandlottie: Thank you @verulamschool for the happiness and growth you’ve given our son for the last 7 years.

We’ve done a selfie w…

What a lovely morning with most of the boys coming to us on their own from their primary schools. They all left feeling less anxious about coming to us on their own now they have met others in the same situation as them. #team7 #verulamforlife #newbeginnings

Reminder that tomorrow evening we are welcoming our new parents and students for our second transition event. Please park in the Jennings road car park for your designated time slot and our lovely sixth form will direct you to the hall. #team7

We now have a fabulous team of tutors in place for our new #team7 eagerly waiting to meet their new forms in July for secondary transfer day on Thursday 14th and transition morning on Saturday 16th! #verulamforlife #newbeginnings

Remember next Thursday evening is our second transition evening where we will be answering a lot of the questions that the boys have been asking on our primary school visits. Please reply to the Google form for your preferred slot! See you Thursday #Team7 #Verulamforlife

More primary school visits over the last few days. Wednesday at Alban City School, Thursday in Hatfield at Green Lanes and Oak View. Today at St Alban and St Peter followed by St Helen’s in Wheathampstead. Lots of lovely and excited boys! #newbeginnings #team7 #verulamforlife
Welcome to our new parents, carers and boys to the first of our transition events. #verulamforlife https://t.co/ubwPxvuFnP

I’ve got a feeling that #team7 is going to be the best year group in September. Park Street and Bernard’s Heath boys are also a great group of students who we visited today! Can’t wait to do more visits! #verulamforlife

So the first week of primary school visits got off to a start this morning. Met a lovely bunch of boys from Fair Field Junior school and they are so enthusiastic about joining #team7 @verulamschool #verulamforlife

I am Mr Knowles, the new Head of Year 7 at @verulamschool in September and from Monday I will be starting a tour of our local primary schools to meet my new #Team7. Can’t wait to see you all and start our 7 Year Journey together #verulamforlife https://t.co/Vk4uwhRL5f

tweets.text: It’s showtime! @verulamschool production of ‘A Christmas Carol’ on 7th/8th Dec. Tickets still available. We’ve really pushed the boat out, must be seen!! #creativearts #VerulamForLife https://t.co/RxNY3lFX3S

The first of our “Maths Hub” Challenges has already caught the eye of a number of our students whilst waiting for their maths lessons or @VerulamYear7 form rooms! Answer the questions to gain house points! @verulamschool #VerulamForLife https://t.co/dttVsu1Ye8

@VerulamYear7 Moving forward, please could updates like this be communicated not just on Twitter but from the school via usual channels? We called the school for an update and got the answer machine so had no idea where our son was until I remembered there was a twitter account.

This week, we are sending an array of letters from our amazing Year 7 students back to their primary cohorts across St. Albans/Herts!

These letters reflect on their first term here at Verulam and provide a great insight for Year 5&6  who will soon undergo this journey !💙 https://t.co/kDaCzNuIzz
Welcome lunch preparations are in full swing for our new Year 7 and their parents ⁦@verulamschool⁩ today 12-2pm #VerulamForLife https://t.co/xxoTU09con

Congratulations to our Year 7 Mob Race Cross Country runners who WON the meet!!

Amazing attitude from all the boys involved and a great way for our new students to represent the school for the very first time💪🏻💙 https://t.co/w6mfN0wXe6
A big focus for us ⁦@verulamschool⁩ this year #InclusiveForLife #CompassionateForLife #CreativeThinkersForLife #VerulamForLife 💜💙 https://t.co/tlkWXOF2rp
Open Evening is the 26th September 5 to 8:30pm #VerulamForLife https://t.co/OVrwsPMxsR
@VerulamYear7 can you confirm if this is correct or if yr7 are back on the 2nd as we were initially told? https://t.co/ok4zTpfput

Today we delivered our first Verulam Pride assembly to Year 10 unveiling our Pride Ambassadors and lanyards, Happy As I Am ECCO club email address where students can contact staff privately to ask for support on LGBT matters 🏳️‍🌈 🏳️‍⚧️ @verulamschool #inclusiveforlife #verulamforlife https://t.co/ygR47c6S6F

Congratulations to the Y13 Class of ‘22 for completing your exams. So lovely to see a full hall again with students, families and teachers for our Celebration Event. A fitting end to a 7 year @verulamschool journey, after the unprecedented last 2 years. Chapeau 👏 https://t.co/35vDjMMyMP

Thank you @verulamschool for the happiness and growth you’ve given our son for the last 7 years.

We’ve done a selfie without him as he’s gone off to the pub with his mates. 
Good luck to all. 🎉
#verulamschool #endofschool #stalbans #secondaryschool #NextStage #alevels2022 https://t.co/VjsKItfufI
